greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 1, a(2n) = n, a(2n+1) = A332819(2n+1).
comment: For any node n >= 2 in binary trees like A332815, a(n) gives the parent node of n.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
formula: a(1) = 1, after which a(n) = n/2 for even n, and a(n) = A332819(n) for odd n.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Mar 01 2020
